title: I got the worst Snowdown shop
body:
http://i.imgur.com/6iw8Lpa.jpg

I haven't played WW, shyvana, or Garen in ten thousand years. I think I might have played Morgana once in a normal, and the tryndamere skin is the worst one that he has. 

I got 20% off a skin for a champion i don't even own. I didn't even know that could happen.
